name: LifeOutsideHogwarts
0:
”Alexa, open Life outside Hogwarts”
”Alexa, start Life outside Hogwarts”
”Alexa, launch Life outside Hogwarts”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: life outside hogwarts
des: You'll be presented 10 scenarios at each visit, real life situations where you get to apply your Potter Charms knowledge. Choose from A, B, or C. You won't be given choices that involve the unforgivable curses, nor spells that infringe upon personal freedom of body use, e.g. Mobilicorpus. It's a family friendly skill :)
